fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40522].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition

Currently, it is only possible to [sort/display tasks by the label on the page where the task resides|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Task+Report+Macro] but pages could potentially contain a mixture of tasks that should be labeled differently.

h3. Suggested Solution

It would increase the functionality of task features exponentially if there was the ability to add a tag/label to each individual task, similarly to the way the @mention can be added to any task that has a checkbox in front of it. This would enable customers  to sort/filter tasks (ie - in a task report macro) by those tags.

h3. Workaround 
None.
fields.summary: Ability to add labels to individual Tasks and sort by Task labels in the Task Report Macro

fields.description:
h3. Summary

In Confluence 5.9.x, bullets are not working as intended in the "Sidebar, header, footer" under *Space Tools*>*Look and Feel*.  Please see the attachment for an example

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a space in Confluence 5.9.x
# Navigate to *Space Tools*
# Select the *Look and Feel* from the menu
# Click on the *Sidebar, header, footer* section
# In the sidebar section, try to add a bullet (ex. * test)

h3. Expected Results

The bullet will appear on the sidebar.  Testing with a numbered list and that works as expected.  For Headers and Footers, the bullet appears next to the text

h3. Actual Results
The bullet does not register.  Anything after the bullet will appear but the bullet is missing.  For Headers and Footers, the bullet is on left margin while the text is centered.

Please see screenshots
fields.summary: Confluence 5.9 Sidebar, header, footer section does not allow bullets

Pagination should follow AUI guidelines (pagination section). https://docs.atlassian.com/aui/latest/docs/navigation.html. 

Pagination should only show few pages (which is 7 according to our #pagination template in macros.vm) in pagination section with the hellip; symbol for the rest of the pages, instead it is showing all the pages available which disturbed the Space directory pagination.

fields.description:
h2. Symptom 1
When someone exposes a filter in a confluence page, if the filter is not visible to the person viewing the page, instead of getting a message similar to what the filter viewer would use explaining that permissions don't allow it, it is showing 
{quote}
"The JIRA server didn't understand your search query. If you entered JQL, please ensure that it's correctly formed. If you entered an issue key, ensure that it exists and you have permission to view it."
{quote}

That is a misleading message since it is permissions rather than JQL that is the problem...unless it is bypassing permissions and is actually running the JQL. But I guess if that is the case, then it is a security issue rather than a message bug.

h2.Symptom 2
The value specify in the JQL does not exist in JIRA even though the field exist. For example:
# In JIRA, a project has Fix Version v1,v2,v3
# there are labels "lab1" , "lab2" in the JIRA instance

In Confluence insert JIRA Issue Macro with following JQL query:
{code}
fixVersion=v5 OR labels=lab1
{code}

*Expected Result*
It will throws, "No search result found"

*Actual Result:*
 !misleading.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Incorrect error message
Confluence show list of search result for anonymous user.

fields.description:
If a PNG image has an alpha transparency channel, then it won't be included in a PDF export. We should allow these to be included in exports. This is confusing for users, especially when their tools use alpha transparency by default.

h3. Workaround

A workaround is to convert the images to not have any transparency, but this is time consuming, as it depends on the number of images that need fixing.
fields.summary: PDF fails to include PNG images with alpha transparency

fields.description:

Resize side bar (grab vertical between side bar and page content and make sidebar wider)

Two rendering issues occur:

- Large amount of vertical space between attachment lines
- Titles compressed to one character per line.

This is very confusing to a new user, although changing the window geometry will get you back to a usable list. It took me I decent amount of time to figure out that it was a rendering problem.

Perhaps the attachment name column should have a minimum width?

fields.description:
h2. Bug description
According to Excel documentation: https://support.office.com/en-us/article/WEEKNUM-function-e5c43a03-b4ab-426c-b411-b18c13c75340

The {{WEEKNUM()}} function in Excel will calculate the number of the week based on a provided date.
* Jan 1 is always Week 1
* The first Sunday encountered after Jan 1 is the beginning of Week 2

The bug is that the ViewXLS macro will erroneously calculate the days of the year *before the first Saturday* as Week 2.

h2. Steps to reproduce
# Download the attached example file: [^weeknumbers.xlsx]
# Upload to Confluence (I tested in Confluence 5.8.18)
# Insert a ViewXLS macro (display name is "Excel Macro") to the page referencing the attachment
# Note the discrepancies in the first few days of each year.

For example, Jan 7 2017 is the first Saturday of 2017. Jan 1 through Jan 6 should all be Week 1, but ViewXLS will show Week 2.

h2. Workarounds
* This bug does _not_ affect the new Files Preview experience introduced in Confluence 5.7. It is recommended to use that over the ViewXLS macro, which [has been deprecated as of Confluence 5.9|https://confluence.atlassian.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=210239673#EndofSupportAnnouncementsforConfluence-features201511]
fields.summary: Viewxls macro wrongly calculates the first week number of each year with the Excel WEEKNUM() function

  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40493].
  {panel}

Existing System Properties:
* atlassian.indexing.contentbody.maxsize - configures the max size to index for all attachments
* officeconnector.spreadsheet.xlsxmaxsize - does the same for Excel files
* officeconnector.textextract.word.docxmaxsize - works for Word files

I'm requesting that we add a property for PDF files specifically as indexing of PDF files has specific performance concerns that could be tuned directly with an attribute for that file type alone.
fields.summary: Add a system property for a max index size for PDF

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40487].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition

Currently if public access is disabled however there are permissions specified for public access any authenticated users will inherit those permissions. 

h3. Suggested Solution
 
When public access is disabled the permissions should revert to default (which is none). 

h3. Workaround 

When public access is disabled globally.  if you had previously specified permissions make sure to remove permissions specified on the public access level in space permissions as well.
fields.summary: If public is disabled  public access space permissions should bet set to default.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40485].
  {panel}

In Confluence, we have a special user group which contains only external users (i. e. users outside our company).
Users of this group should not be able to access the People Directory, because it gives them a list of all internal users (i. e. employees of our company).
We found a way to hide the "People" button in the top menu by adding a script to the Main Site Layout.
However, if the user goes to his own profile, there is another "People" link above the user name. Which leads the user back to the people directory and there's no way to hide the link.

Of course it would be even better to completely restrict access to the browsepeople.action page for certain user groups.
fields.summary: Restrict access to People Directory for certain user groups

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40478].
  {panel}

Currently, tasks are very one dimensional. They exist inline, and are displayed in a table or task report macro.

However, it'd be nice to create and assign tasks on a page without having to assign the owner and due date inline - perhaps from a dedicated UI?

A status field would also be very helpful for storing information about the task itself, without necessarily going into the task body.

While it sounds like these might be more suited to JIRA, there are also scenarios where customers would like to present clients a list of outstanding tasks (without them having access to the underlying JIRA)
fields.summary: Make tasks first class citizens in Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40477].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
There is not currently integration between Confluence and HipChat that allows for users in HipChat to select certain data or chat messages and relay it to a specific Confluence page. The purpose of this functionality would be to allow for important information shared through HipChat to be archived in a central location (a Confluence page) where users can view important information and leave comments/inline comments. Copied chats would include the date/time stamp as well as the sender.

h3. Suggested Solutions
* Include an option to highlight text in HipChat, or select a message in HipChat and send to a specific Confluence page.
** A more integrated/advanced version of having better copy/paste features between HC and Confluence: https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-25753
* Allow auto archiving of all chats in a HipChat room to a corresponding Confluence Page
* Create a tag, and use the predetermined hashtags in HipChat messages to designate which HipChat messages should move to which Confluence page
fields.summary: Send selected HipChat messages to a Confluence Page for archiving

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40475].
  {panel}

I was able to reproduce on our cloud instance (and some other instance like yours).

+Atlassian Confluence v5.8.17:+
https://confluence.atlassian.com/rest/api/content/search?cql=(space=%22TEAMCAL%22%20AND%20type=%22attachment%22)&limit=50&start=650&expand=container
*Error:* The entity spacedesc: Team Calendars for Confluence v.9 (240912700) is not ContentConvertible or API available.

https://confluence.atlassian.com/rest/api/content/search?cql=(space=%22SMT%22%20AND%20type=%22attachment%22)&limit=50&start=0&expand=container
*Error:* The entity spacedesc: Summit 2011 Speaker Guidelines v.7 (173768813) is not ContentConvertible or API available.

+Public Apache Wiki v.5.8.4:+
https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/rest/api/content/search?cql=(space=%22ACE%22%20AND%20type=%22attachment%22)&limit=50&start=0&expand=container
*Error:* The entity spacedesc: Apache ACE v.2 (115845) is not ContentConvertible or API available.

+On our Cloud instance v6.0.0 (coveord.atlassian.net):+
https://coveord.atlassian.net/wiki/rest/api/content/search?cql=(space=%22SC%22%20AND%20type=%22attachment%22)&limit=50&start=0&expand=container
*Error:* The entity spacedesc: Sitecore v.1 (5865532) is not ContentConvertible or API available.

We have two instance on-premise 5.7.1 and 5.8.5 and they don't seem to be affected.

h3. Workaround
Workaround from [~dstuder@tvc.org] in the comment. Thank you for this.
# The REST call can work if this is added to the CQL
** {code:java}type="attachment" AND space="TEST" and container!="{id of the space description container}"{code}
*** We will first have to get the ID of the _SPACEDESCRIPTION_ content from the error message.
# The second workaround below will only work if there are no attachment on a page with the title being the Space Key of the Space itself without a file extension.
** {code:java}type="attachment" AND space="TEST" and title!="TEST"{code}
fields.summary: Search REST API fails on casting error "ContentConvertible" related to the Space description

{code}
2016-1-17 11:52:01,466 ERROR [scheduler_Worker-9] [confluence.mail.template.ConfluenceMailQueueItem] send Unable to send email with subject 'Administrator Request' to <asd@asd.com,name@xxx.com,name@xxxxx.com> reason: javax.mail.MessagingException: Unknown SMTP host: test.smtp.com;

h4. Symptoms
- Certain pages with macros do not render on time, the page times out
- The following or similar stack trace appears in the logs: {code}2016-01-08 09:15:55,846 ERROR [ajp-nio-8009-exec-3] [adaptavist.analytics.common.GoogleAnalyticsService] sendDataToAnalytics Unable to send analytics data to google service!

        at com.adaptavist.analytics.macrosusage.AbstractAnalyticsLegacyMacro.execute(AbstractAnalyticsLegacyMacro.java:32)

        at com.adaptavist.analytics.macrosusage.AbstractAnalyticsLegacyMacro.execute(AbstractAnalyticsLegacyMacro.java:32)
        at com.adaptavist.confluence.contentformatting.ContentFormattingMacro.renderMacro(ContentFormattingMacro.java:49)
        at com.adaptavist.analytics.macrosusage.AbstractAnalyticsLegacyMacro.execute(AbstractAnalyticsLegacyMacro.java:32)

...
{code}

h4. Environment
- Adaptavist Content Formatting Macros version 4.2.13-4.2.15 is installed

h4. Problem
This is an issue with the mentioned third-party add-on. The problem is caused by the add-on gathering Google Analytics data and tries to send it. If this fails for any reason (network error for example), the macro rendering may take longer than the page rendering timeout.

h4. Workaround
Downgrade to any version of the plugin prior to 4.2.13.

h4. Solution
If you have an active support license with Adaptavist, you can track this issue with reference {{CONTENTF-251}}. Wait for the bug to be fixed and install the plugin version that contains it.
*Update:* The issue was reportedly fixed in version 4.2.16 of the plugin.
fields.summary: Some macros/pages fail to render with Content Formatting Macros

{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40468].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
*Edit in Office* feature returns permission error when trying to upload documents in IE 11

h3. Environment
* Confluence {{6.0.0-OD-2016.02.1-0006}}
* Internet Explorer 11 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a page and insert and Ms Office file as attachment using the *Office*
# Save
# Go to {{...}} at the top left > Attachments
# Choose _Edit in Office_ beside the attachment you want edit.
Your browser will ask you to confirm that you want to open the file. 
# Choose OK. 
You may also see a security warning or be asked to log in to your Confluence server - enter your Confluence username and password, then choose OK.
# The file will open in your Office application.
# Make your changes.
# Save the document. 

h3. Expected Results
Attachment file is saved back to Confluence

h3. Actual Results
This error is returned:
{noformat}
Upload Failed: Permission Issue

We saved your changes, but we couldn't verify that you have the necessary permissions to upload the file. Check your permissions with the document owner or click Resolve for more options.
{noformat}

* Clicking _Resolve_ pops up a window to enter authentication, however doesn't resolve the issue.

h3. Notes
* These steps should work as it follows the documentation mentioned here:
** https://confluence.atlassian.com/confcloud/edit-office-files-724765124.html
* This happens even if the user has sufficient permission to view/edit the attachments. 

h3.Workaround
* Download the file, edit and upload new version to the Confluence page manually.
fields.summary: Edit in Office feature returns permission error when trying to upload documents in IE 11
Show related pages in Attachment Properties

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40466].
  {panel}

Edited page should trigger the [notification feature|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF43/Managing+Notifications+in+Confluence] as well instead of just the following event:

{quote}
The workbox displays a notification when someone does one of the following in Confluence:

* [Shares|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF43/Emailing+a+Page] a page or blog post with you.
* [Mentions|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF43/Using+Mentions] you in a page, blog post or comment.
* Comments on a page or blog post that you are [watching|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF43/Watching+a+Page+or+Blog+Post].
* [Likes|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONF43/Likes+and+Popular+Content] a page or blog post that you are watching.
The workbox does not show notifications triggered because you are watching a space. Only watches on pages and blog posts are relevant here.{quote}

By allowing page edition to be included into the notification feature, Confluence could discard e-mail notification altogether and rely on the notification feature. This will make working with Confluence completely independent of email system if i want to keep track of changes of pages i care about.
This would also solve the digestion mail issue (https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-14485), due to many small updates (which i think should be encouraged), because you will be able to simply replace the notification already created, regarding editting of page, with a new one, which is difficult to do with email. It should of course be optional to recieve notification on this, as it should be optional to recieve notifications about likes.

If you ask me, email notifications should just be an extra option on all the different types of notifications you want in your WorkBox. Maybe WorkBox should be split into a "Work"-box with things that require some action or has high attention like mentions, comments to things i have written, or changes to jira elements i am assigned to. low attentions notificaiton could be updates to pages/spaces i am watching and likes of comments or pages.
fields.summary: Watched Edited Page should trigger notification

h3. Step to reproduce:

You can manually add them later using JIRA macro.{quote}

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40462].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
When creating a table of contents with the TOC Macro on a page, you can click on the anchor and it takes you to the respective section on the page. Once in that section, you can click the  "Back" button in the browser window and be taken back to the table of contents. If you are affected by this bug, you are not automatically redirect back when clicking "Back."

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Insert Table of Contents Macro
# Create headers for each section
# Add content to each section so that scrolling is necessary to arrive at sections
# View page and click on an item in the table of contents
# Once on that section of the page, click "Back" in your browser window.

h3. Expected Results
You should be returned to the table of contents.

h3. Actual Results
Page remains in current section.
 
h3.Workaround
# Insert a new macro: Table of Content Zone
# Drag your original table of content macro icon into the new Table of Content Zone
# Click "Save"
fields.summary: Table of contents macro does not respond to browser's "Back" button

fields.description:
When using Anchors on a single page, clicking the anchored link does not scroll the page to the anchor location. Refreshing the page does.

Steps to reproduce:
On any page, create an anchor.
On that same page, reference the anchor.
Save the page.
Click the anchor link.

This is for Confluence 5.9.1 installed.
fields.summary: When using Anchors on a single page, clicking the anchored link does not scroll the page to the anchor location. Refreshing the page does.

h3. Summary

When a table contains a combination of numbers and letters, sorting does not properly alphabetize the columns.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Create a table with the following data:
||Column 1||Column 2||
|a|abc|
|b|aab|
|3|acb|
|abc|bbc|
|jha|bac|
|2bcd|bbb|
|1zja|bca|
|aaks|bcb|
# Save table
# Click Column 1 to sort

h3. Expected Results

The table will be sorted in correct alphabetical order. 

h3. Actual Results

Table is sorted as follows (Column 1):

1	
1zja	
2	
2bcd	
3	
abc	
jha	
aaks	

Notice jha is between abc and aaks. I would expect it would sort aaks, abc, jha. 

h3. Notes
See screenshot attached. 

h3.Workaround
No workaround available.
fields.summary: Tables are sorted incorrectly

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40459].
  {panel}

h3. Summary

Customer generates a backup from Cloud and tries to import into an OD release, but it fails. 

h3. Steps to Reproduce:
* Import a backup from Cloud to a Confluence 6.0.0-OD _(Cog Icon > General Configuration > Backup and Restore)_, it doesn't matter if it's in a brand new instance or the current one.

h3. Expected Results:
* Import is successful

h3. Actual Results:
* Import fails with the following stack-trace relating to a certain _jobRunnerKey_:

{code}
2016-01-14 14:51:51,767 ERROR [Long running task: Importing data] [confluence.importexport.xmlimport.DefaultImportProcessor] persist Error while saving object: Imported[com.atlassian.confluence.impl.schedule.caesium.SchedulerClusteredJob] [Id[id]=26181634, Property[jobId]=com.atlassian.crowd.manager.directory.monitor.poller.DirectoryPollerManager.5308417, Property[nextRunTime]=2016-01-13 17:40:53.202, Property[version]=236, Property[jobRunnerKey]=com.atlassian.crowd.manager.directory.monitor.poller.DirectoryPollerManager, Property[rawParameters]=java.io.BufferedInputStream@15d47d4, Property[schedType]=I, Property[cronExpression]=, Property[cronTimeZone]=, Property[intervalFirstRunTime]=2016-01-04 01:33:48.884, Property[intervalMillis]=3600000]
 -- referer: http://localhost:8600/confluence/admin/restore-local-file.action | url: /confluence/longrunningtaskxml.action | traceId: 7055808d4953e33d | userName: admin | action: longrunningtaskxml 
{code}

h3. Root Cause
There's a cronjob that's causing the issue here:
{code}
<object class="SchedulerClusteredJob" package="com.atlassian.confluence.impl.schedule.caesium">
<id name="id">26181634</id>
<property name="jobId"><![CDATA[com.atlassian.crowd.manager.directory.monitor.poller.DirectoryPollerManager.5308417]]></property>
<property name="nextRunTime">2016-01-13 17:40:53.202</property>
<property name="version">236</property>
<property name="jobRunnerKey"><![CDATA[com.atlassian.crowd.manager.directory.monitor.poller.DirectoryPollerManager]]></property>
<property name="rawParameters">java.io.BufferedInputStream@15d47d4</property>
<property name="schedType">I</property>
<property name="cronExpression"/><property name="cronTimeZone"/><property name="intervalFirstRunTime">2016-01-04 01:33:48.884</property>
<property name="intervalMillis">3600000</property>
</object>
{code}

h3. Workaround

Remove the problematic cronjob(s) from {{entities.xml}}:

# Extract the files from the backup archive, and open {{entities.xml}}
# Search {{entities.xml}} for objects with jobRunnerKey *com.atlassian.crowd.manager.directory.monitor.poller.DirectoryPollerManager* and remove them (from <object> to </object>.
# Zip up all files that were extracted from the backup, taking care not to include the enclosing folder (as described [here|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/XML+backup+restore+failed+with+'The+zip+file+did+not+contain+an+entry+'exportDescriptor.properties''+in+Confluence])
# Import the new backup archive into a fresh Confluence instance
fields.summary: Restore a backup from Cloud fails with Illegal base64 character 2e

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
*NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40457].
{panel}
h5. Suggestion

The deprecated [XML-RPC and SOAP APIs|https://developer.atlassian.com/confdev/confluence-rest-api/confluence-xml-rpc-and-soap-apis] used to have an {{exportSpace}} functionality, however they are deprecated since Confluence 5.5. The [REST API|https://developer.atlassian.com/confdev/confluence-rest-api] functionality does not include an option for creating space/site exports. Even if the exported XML is not transferred via the REST interface, the action could trigger the backup of any given space or the instance to the export directory, optionally providing a download link for it
h5. Workaround
 # The [Confluence CLI|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/org.swift.confluence.cli/cloud/overview] provides such functionality, but it is a paid third-party add-on. The above functionality would be important to automate migration/backup tasks for administrators.
 # Although deprecated, you may still use the [RPC-API|https://confluence.atlassian.com/conf613/enabling-the-remote-api-964961434.html] to export the entire Space – see the examples below.
 ** [Confluence JSON-RPC APIs|https://developer.atlassian.com/server/confluence/confluence-json-rpc-apis]
 ** [Remote Confluence methods|https://developer.atlassian.com/server/confluence/remote-confluence-methods/]
 ** [Remote API Specification for PDF export|https://developer.atlassian.com/server/confluence/remote-api-specification-for-pdf-export/]

h4. Export a Space to XML.
{code:java}
USRNAME=admin
USRPWD=password
CONFBASEURL=http://127.0.0.1:8090/confluence
SPACE_KEY=SPACEKEY

curl -s \
    --user $USRNAME:$USRPWD \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \
    -X POST \
    -d '{ "jsonrpc" : "2.0", "method" : "exportSpace", "params" : ["'${SPACE_KEY}'", "TYPE_XML", "true"], "id": 7 }' \
    ${CONFBASEURL}'/rpc/json-rpc/confluenceservice-v2?os_authType=basic'
{code}
h4. Export a Space to HTML.
{code:java}
USRNAME=admin
USRPWD=password
CONFBASEURL=http://127.0.0.1:8090/confluence
SPACE_KEY=SPACEKEY

curl -s \
    --user $USRNAME:$USRPWD \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \
    -X POST \
    -d '{ "jsonrpc" : "2.0", "method" : "exportSpace", "params" : ["'${SPACE_KEY}'", "TYPE_HTML", "true"], "id": 7 }' \
    ${CONFBASEURL}'/rpc/json-rpc/confluenceservice-v2?os_authType=basic'
{code}
h4. Export a Space to PDF.
{code:java}
USRNAME=admin
USRPWD=password
CONFBASEURL=http://127.0.0.1:8090/confluence
SPACE_KEY=SPACEKEY

curl -s \
    --user $USRNAME:$USRPWD \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \
    -X POST \
    -d '{ "jsonrpc" : "2.0", "method" : "exportSpace", "params" : ["'${SPACE_KEY}'"], "id": 7 }' \
    ${CONFBASEURL}'/rpc/json-rpc/pdfexport?os_authType=basic'
{code}
h4. Space import

For possible workarounds on importing spaces, please also check this KB article: [Confluence Space Import Via Scripting Tools|https://confluence.atlassian.com/confkb/confluence-space-import-via-scripting-tools-1041075950.html]
fields.summary: Add REST API endpoint for generating space exports

h3. Summary
Page tree expansion process during page move attempt for pages that have a large number of child pages takes a long time to display all of the children pages should *Browse* function is used from _Move Page_ dialog feature.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Attempt to move a parent page with a large number of child pages (200-1000++ child pages) via *{{...}} >> Move >> Browse* on the page that you're about to move.
# Watch the spinning wheel going for a long time (approx. 15-50 seconds) while Confluence tries to finished the Page Tree expansion process.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
*NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40451].
{panel}
h3. Summary

The JIRA 'Change log' Report creator in Confluence no longer works. 
 When attempting to create a report the screen the 'loading' icon is displayed indefinitely and the report never loads.

This worked in 5.9.4, and broke in 6.0.0
h3. Environment
 * Confluence Version 6.0.0-OD-2016.02.1-0006

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # In confluence click on the '...' next to the 'Create' button in the top menu bar
 # Select 'JIRA Report' and click 'next'
 # Select 'Change Log' and click 'next'
 # Select a Project from the drop down menu, leave other fields as default and click 'create'

h3. Expected Results
 # The report is created and the page is loaded

h3. Actual Results
 * The loading icon will be displayed indefinitely and nothing will happen, the report is not created
 * The below exception is thrown in the logs
{noformat}
ERROR [http-bio-1990-exec-16] [common.error.jersey.ThrowableExceptionMapper] toResponse Uncaught exception thrown by REST service: com.atlassian.confluence.extra.jira.JiraIssuesManager.retrieveXMLAsChannel(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/util/List;Lcom/atlassian/applinks/api/ApplicationLink;ZZ)Lcom/atlassian/confluence/extra/jira/JiraIssuesManager$Channel;
 -- referer: https://<omitted> | url: /wiki/rest/create-dialog/1.0/content-blueprint/create-draft | traceId: 5427a38ed50bfa63 | userName: <omitted>
2016-01-12 11:55:16.303976500 java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: com.atlassian.confluence.extra.jira.JiraIssuesManager.retrieveXMLAsChannel(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/util/List;Lcom/atlassian/applinks/api/ApplicationLink;ZZ)Lcom/atlassian/confluence/extra/jira/JiraIssuesManager$Channel;
{noformat}

 * Error showing in the Chrome browser Console:
{noformat}
POST https://<site>.atlassian.net/wiki/rest/create-dialog/1.0/content-blueprint/create-draft 500 (Internal Server Error)
{noformat}

h3. Workaround

"switch to advanced" prior to hitting "create" works for some users
h4. Resolution

Upgrade to Confluence 6.6.10+, or Confluence 6.8+

Note that this issue is not fixed in Confluence 6.7.x
fields.summary: Confluence 'Create JIRA Report - Change log' doesn't load

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
*NOTE:* Whilst this issues relates to both Cloud and Server, as the current limitation related to the import into Confluence Cloud, please vote/comment on the [corresponding Cloud suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40449].
{panel}
h3. Problem Definition

Customer migrates large confluence server instance to cloud. Currently for confluence there is a 200MB uncompressed XML limit. For larger customers even if they break down the backup into space exports. There space exports can exceed that size pretty easily.
h3. Suggested Solution

Provide a method for larger customers to migrate large XML imports into Cloud.
h3. Workaround
 - Reduce space size by curating and archiving older data into backups to meet compliance needs.
 - Break down larger spaces into smaller spaces that meet the ~200MB size limit for imports.
fields.summary: Increase size limit for imports for bigger customers migrating from server to cloud.

h3. Summary When inserting an HTML code referring the link between a single quote, into HTML macro, the tag gets appended to the URL and the link no longer works. h3. Steps to Reproduce # Insert HTML macro to any page in Confluence. # Paste an HTML code into it. For example: {code}
  • [google]{code} h3. Expected Results The HTML macro would show it exactly the same way: {code}
  • [google]{code} h3. Actual Results The HTML macro appends the tag to the link and it does not resolves: {code}
  • [google]{code} h3. Workaround To use double quotes instead of single quotes, or do not use quotes at all.

fields.description:
The ClusterSafetyJob is a task that safeguards against data integrity issues by preventing multiple Confluence servers (or Confluence nodes outside of a recognized cluster) from updating the same database.

Expected behavior is that it runs every 30 seconds, but it is actually oddly running at 00 and 15 seconds of every minute (instead of the expected 00 and 30). This is observed through Confluence Admin > Scheduled Jobs, for example:
{code}
18:18:15
18:18:00
18:17:15
18:17:00
{code}

That said, this is very unlikely to have impact on DB integrity, given that the job still runs very frequently, hence the minor priority designation.
fields.summary: Confluence cluster safety job fires in odd intervals

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40425].
  {panel}

h4. Problem
The current [documentation for SQL server|https://confluence.atlassian.com/doc/database-setup-for-sql-server-9258.html] does not specify the SQL server dialect that should be used. Older versions of Confluence with {{net.sf.hibernate.dialect.SQLServerDialect}}, but that by default will create columns with {{varchar}} instead of {{nvarchar}}. 

h4. Suggestion
Latest versions of Confluence will fail with the incorrect column type. The supported dialect is {{net.sf.hibernate.dialect.SQLServerIntlDialect}}. This should be mentioned in upgrade documentation for MSSQL and also the MSSQL specific documentation above.

h4. References
- https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-18903
- https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Confluence+upgrade+fails+because+SQL+Server+could+not+complete+schema+update
fields.summary: Documentation request: Specify the supported SQL Server dialect

fields.description:
h3. *Steps to reproduce :*

# Create a new page in Confluence using IE11
# Notice that you cannot find the buttons on the bottom right.
# The buttons will be visible once there's enough text entered to "push" the page down.

h3. *Cause :*
The privacy policy agreement acknowledgement on the top bar of the screen is causing this problem. It only happens in Internet Explorer.

h3. *Workaround :*
Acknowledge the privacy policy.
fields.summary: Save, preview, close button not visible in Internet Explorer during page creation.

fields.description:
I found that the Sidebar overlaps the top menu if an 'You have temporary access to administrative functions' message is displayed on top. It also affects the Navigation Menu Editor plugin. However, this bug appears even if you disable this plugin.

*Reproduction:*
# Sign in admin panel and return to the wiki (without removing the token).
# Locate the page where there is a vertical scroll bar.
# Scroll to the bottom and then to the up using the mouse wheel.

Please find the screenshot in attachment.
fields.summary: Sidebar overlapping top menu

fields.description:
The "people" filter is not longer available on Confluence 5.9 onwards. 
There's no such category as "people" even when the custom filter is chosen.

Previously available filter :
 !filter.PNG|thumbnail! 

[Confluence's 5.9 release notes picture|https://confluence.atlassian.com/doc/confluence-5-9-release-notes-785333580.html#Confluence5.9ReleaseNotes-Searchsmarter,withnewfilters] shows that it's still available but it's not.
It still exists in Confluence 5.8.16

Users however are still searchable by using :
- "All content" type but it will include all the contents related to him as well.
- Accessing the URL. (i) Replace <USER> and <Confluence URL> accordingly.
{noformat}
<Confluence URL>/dosearchsite.action?cql=siteSearch~"<USER>"and+type="user"
{noformat}
fields.summary: People filter is missing from the search
Cannot create bulk issues from Confluence table with a required custom field

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40419].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition

Currently there isn't a streamlined way to apply permissions to a collection of spaces to user groups.

You can manage global permissions to a degree and you could manage individual space permissions. 

What's more you have to micro manage page restrictions if you only want users to edit particular pages. Child pages do not inherit permissions recursively from parent permissions. This creates a head ache for the use case if you have parent pages that have thousands of child pages different restriction requirements. You essentially would have to make each Parent page a space to meet the requirement. 

h3. Suggested Solution

Provide method similar to Permission schemes in JIRA for Projects for Spaces in Confluence that fits the permission structure spaces and pages.
fields.summary: Ability to have Space Permission schemes and recursive parent page restrictions.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40418].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
After a page has had several images removed from the body content. Attachments will start to build on the page that aren't actively used. 

h3. Suggested Solution
 
Have a quick UI method of removing image files that are no longer actively being used in the page. 

h3. Workaround 
Check body content of page and grab image file names and compare them to the attachments on the page. Remove the images that aren't in the body content.
fields.summary: Allow quick way to remove attachments from a page that aren't being used actively in the page.
Inline Comments Can not currently be seen in edit mode

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40416].
  {panel}

h3. Summary

When copying a  page with a large amount of attachments (Either in high number or large in size) in the same space. It generates an error "Saving is not possible at the moment."


h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Step 1 Attach 100+ attachments or several Large (1GB +) attachments to a page and save it. 
# Attempt to copy the page in the same space and save it.

I was not able to reproduce it if I saved and moved it to another space. It only reproduced if I was making a copy, renaming it, and saving it within the same space. 

h3. Expected Results

Page copies with attachments successfully. 

h3. Actual Results

Page will error in saving is not possible at the moment. It will finally save if you wait for a short period of time. It doesn't appear to copy over all the attachments. In my testing it seems that it copies only the active attachments in the body content.

h3. Notes

It seems during the draft there isn't enough time perform the copy>draft>conversion before the saving action is complete. 

h3.Workaround

If you wait a moment it will eventually save. Also you could potentially copy and save it to another space and move the copy back into the original source space.

Roadmap Planner Macro

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-40414].
  {panel}

h3. Problem Definition
Sometimes cached authentication data in Confluence prevents users from seeing updated changes (such as group memberships). To resolve this, users will need to log out, clear their cookies, and log back in.

h3. Suggested Solution
Create an 'Expire all cookies' task that can be run by users in the scheduled jobs. There is already a task that does this for expired RememberMe tokens.

h3. Workaround 
Please follow these steps to expire all cookies in Confluence:
(!) Shutdown Confluence and backup your database before making any of these changes.
# Run the following on your database. This will set the 'created' date for the cookies to 11/01/2015 (in epoch time):
{code:sql}
UPDATE remembermetoken SET created = 1446337357;
{code}
# Go to !http://i.imgur.com/jGuDYP2.png! -> cache management -> flush all
# Go to !http://i.imgur.com/jGuDYP2.png! -> General configuration -> scheduled jobs -> Clear Expired Remember Me Tokens -> Run
# Restart Confluence
(!) If you've set the rememberMe token expiration higher, you will need to create a new date using epoch time that exceeds that period.
fields.summary: Expire all cookies functionality

fields.description:
*Steps to replicate*
# Install confluence version 5.9.2 or 5.9.3
# Create a page
# Add html-include macro and add the following html macro url
{code}
http://php.net/manual/en/indexes.php
{code}
# Save page
# Go to confluence whitelist page and add the following url
{code}
http://php.net
{code}
# Go the page you created earlier and click edit.

*Observed behavior*
White page

*Expected behavior*
Able to see the macro and edit the page
fields.summary: Unable to edit page after adding Html-include macro

fields.description:
*Steps to replicate*
# Go to Confluence Dashboard.
# Single click on left navigation (Recently worked on, Recently visited, ...) 

*Expected Behaviour*
Confluence will redirect to the (Recently worked on, Recently visited, ...) with single click.

*Actual Behaviour*
Confluence doesn't navigate to the (Recently worked on, Recently visited, ...) with single click.
It will only works with double click.

*Additional Notes*
This only occurs in Internet Explorer (Tested with IE11)
fields.summary: Need to click twice on left navigation in Confluence Dashboard in IE

fields.description:
(!) This issue is tracked as [https://ecosystem.atlassian.net/browse/STP-396], this bug is created for Hercules to pick up the regexp. Please monitor that ticket for progress.
h4. Problem
When generating a support.zip with version 3.7.11 of the [Support Tools Plugin|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.atlassian.support.stp/versions], the following error is thrown in {{atlassian-confluence.log}}:
{noformat}2016-01-06 17:41:20,513 WARN [support-request] [support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask] zip Error processing 'Healthchecks Results': NullPointerException: Specified service reference cannot be null.
 -- referer: https://wiki.vsct.fr/plugins/servlet/stp/view/ | url: /plugins/servlet/stp/view/support-zip/execute | userName: robert_mota
java.lang.NullPointerException: Specified service reference cannot be null.
        at org.apache.felix.framework.BundleContextImpl.ungetService(BundleContextImpl.java:338)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.salext.bundle.HealthcheckResultsBundle.getHealthcheckResults(HealthcheckResultsBundle.java:80)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.salext.bundle.HealthcheckResultsBundle.getFiles(HealthcheckResultsBundle.java:39)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask.zip(CreateSupportZipTask.java:202)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask.createSupportZip(CreateSupportZipTask.java:73)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask$1.call(CreateSupportZipTask.java:55)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask$1.call(CreateSupportZipTask.java:52)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask.call(CreateSupportZipTask.java:57)
        at com.atlassian.support.tools.request.CreateSupportZipTask.call(CreateSupportZipTask.java:26)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745){noformat}

Despite the error, the support.zip will be generated.

h4. Workaround
No action needed, however:
- Version 3.7.5 does not reproduce the issue, thus downgrading may be an option until a fix is available.
- Unchecking {{Health Check Results}} tickbox avoids the error.

h4. Possible cause
bq. Included Healthchecks results in Support Zip for Confluence and JIRA.
- In release [3.7.11|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.atlassian.support.stp/versions]
fields.summary: "Error processing 'Healthchecks Results': NullPointerException: Specified service reference cannot be null." when generating support.zip

fields.description:
Upgrading a Confluence 5.7.4 to 5.9.3, I'm encountering extremely slow reindexing times.

The CPU on the MySQL server is spiked very high compared to a reindex on version 5.7.4

During indexing, it's running some very slow queries:

{noformat}
mysql> explain select contentent0_.CONTENTID as CONTENTID, contentent0_.CONTENTTYPE as CONTENTT2_, contentent0_.HIBERNATEVERSION as HIBERNAT3_, contentent0_.TITLE as TITLE, contentent0_.VERSION as VERSION, contentent0_.CREATOR as CREATOR, contentent0_.CREATIONDATE as CREATION7_, contentent0_.LASTMODIFIER as LASTMODI8_, contentent0_.LASTMODDATE as LASTMODD9_, contentent0_.VERSIONCOMMENT as VERSION10_, contentent0_.PREVVER as PREVVER, contentent0_.CONTENT_STATUS as CONTENT12_, contentent0_.PAGEID as PAGEID, contentent0_.SPACEID as SPACEID, contentent0_.CHILD_POSITION as CHILD_P15_, contentent0_.PARENTID as PARENTID, contentent0_.MESSAGEID as MESSAGEID, contentent0_.PLUGINKEY as PLUGINKEY, contentent0_.PLUGINVER as PLUGINVER, contentent0_.PARENTCCID as PARENTCCID, contentent0_.DRAFTPAGEID as DRAFTPA21_, contentent0_.DRAFTSPACEKEY as DRAFTSP22_, contentent0_.DRAFTTYPE as DRAFTTYPE, contentent0_.DRAFTPAGEVERSION as DRAFTPA24_, contentent0_.PARENTCOMMENTID as PARENTC25_, contentent0_.USERNAME as USERNAME from CONTENT contentent0_ where (contentent0_.VERSION in(select max(contentent1_.VERSION) from CONTENT contentent1_ where ((contentent1_.PREVVER=16782183 )AND(contentent1_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' ))OR((contentent1_.CONTENTID=16782183 )AND(contentent1_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' )) group by  contentent1_.LASTMODIFIER))AND((contentent0_.PREVVER=16782183 )AND(contentent0_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' ))OR((contentent0_.CONTENTID=16782183 )AND(contentent0_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' )) order by  contentent0_.VERSION asc;
+----+-------------+--------------+------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------+---------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
| id | select_type | table        | type | possible_keys                                         | key          | key_len | ref   | rows   | Extra                                                               |
+----+-------------+--------------+------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------+---------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
|  1 | PRIMARY     | contentent0_ | ref  | PRIMARY,c_prevver_idx,c_status_idx                    | c_status_idx | 768     | const | 505234 | Using index condition; Using where; Using filesort                  |
|  2 | SUBQUERY    | contentent1_ | ref  | PRIMARY,c_prevver_idx,c_lastmodifier_idx,c_status_idx | c_status_idx | 768     | const | 505234 | Using index condition; Using where; Using temporary; Using filesort |
+----+-------------+--------------+------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------+---------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------------------------------------+
{noformat}

Here's one example from MySQL's slow query log:

{noformat}
# Query_time: 10.333101  Lock_time: 0.000209  Rows_sent: 1  Rows_examined: 2010571  Error_code: 0
SET timestamp=1452036950;
select contentent0_.CONTENTID as CONTENTID, contentent0_.CONTENTTYPE as CONTENTT2_, contentent0_.HIBERNATEVERSION as HIBERNAT3_, contentent0_.TITLE as TITLE, contentent0_.VERSION as VERSION, contentent0_.CREATOR as CREATOR, contentent0_.CREATIONDATE as CREATION7_, contentent0_.LASTMODIFIER as LASTMODI8_, contentent0_.LASTMODDATE as LASTMODD9_, contentent0_.VERSIONCOMMENT as VERSION10_, contentent0_.PREVVER as PREVVER, contentent0_.CONTENT_STATUS as CONTENT12_, contentent0_.PAGEID as PAGEID, contentent0_.SPACEID as SPACEID, contentent0_.CHILD_POSITION as CHILD_P15_, contentent0_.PARENTID as PARENTID, contentent0_.MESSAGEID as MESSAGEID, contentent0_.PLUGINKEY as PLUGINKEY, contentent0_.PLUGINVER as PLUGINVER, contentent0_.PARENTCCID as PARENTCCID, contentent0_.DRAFTPAGEID as DRAFTPA21_, contentent0_.DRAFTSPACEKEY as DRAFTSP22_, contentent0_.DRAFTTYPE as DRAFTTYPE, contentent0_.DRAFTPAGEVERSION as DRAFTPA24_, contentent0_.PARENTCOMMENTID as PARENTC25_, contentent0_.USERNAME as USERNAME from CONTENT contentent0_ where (contentent0_.VERSION in(select max(contentent1_.VERSION) from CONTENT contentent1_ where ((contentent1_.PREVVER=16784251 )AND(contentent1_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' ))OR((contentent1_.CONTENTID=16784251 )AND(contentent1_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' )) group by  contentent1_.LASTMODIFIER))AND((contentent0_.PREVVER=16784251 )AND(contentent0_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' ))OR((contentent0_.CONTENTID=16784251 )AND(contentent0_.CONTENT_STATUS='current' )) order by  contentent0_.VERSION asc;
{noformat}

The Reindex progress has been stuck at 3% for the last one hour. This doesn't happen in Confluence 5.7.4.

MySQL version: 5.6.21
JDBC Driver: 5.1.25

During the upgrade, I did not see any schema upgrade problems:

fields.description:
h3. Summary

Exporting selected pages of a relatively large space to XML will failed and the error message: "Couldn't backup database data" is shown in the UI
h3. Environment
 * Oracle 11g
 * Oracle 12
 * SQL Server
 * Microsoft SQL Server

h3. Steps to Reproduce
 # Have Confluence connected to Oracle 11g
 # Have a relatively large space (with 1000+ deleted pages in Oracle)
 # Go to Space Tools > Content Tools > Export > XML
 # Custom Export > Choose few pages
 # Export

h3. Expected Results

Export was successful
h3. Actual Results

Export was not successful
 !exportfaileddd.png|thumbnail!
{noformat}
2015-12-08 14:36:48,837 ERROR [Long running task: Export Space] [confluence.importexport.impl.AbstractXmlExporter] backupEntities Couldn't backup database data.
 -- referer: https://www-test.wiki.ed.ac.uk/spaces/exportspacexml.action?key=GenePool | url: /spaces/doexportspace.action | userName: aforres3 | action: doexportspace
org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: Hibernate operation: Could not execute query; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-01795: maximum number of expressions in a list is 1000
...
Caused by: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-01795: maximum number of expressions in a list is 1000
...
{noformat}
This has also been observed with SQL Server:
{noformat}
2018-10-22 23:08:42,036 WARN [Long running task: Export Space] [hibernate.query.internal.QueryParameterBindingsImpl] expandListValuedParameters HHH000443: Dialect [com.atlassian.confluence.impl.hibernate.dialect.SQLServerDialect] limits the number of elements in an IN predicate to 2100 entries.  However, the given parameter list [exclusions] contained 20701 entries, which will likely cause failures to execute the query in the database
{noformat}

For the Confluence running on the MSSQL server, the error message in the logs is this one:

{code:java}
 2020-05-26 17:44:23,744 ERROR [Long running task: Export Space] [engine.jdbc.spi.SqlExceptionHelper] logExceptions The incoming request has too many parameters. The server supports a maximum of 2100 parameters. Reduce the number of parameters and resend the request.
 – url: /spaces/doexportspace.action | referer: [https://xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx:spaces/exportspacexml.action?key=SPACE] | traceId: 116358ab22940a24 | userName: xxxxxxx | action: doexportspace
 2020-05-26 17:44:23,745 ERROR [Long running task: Export Space] [confluence.importexport.impl.AbstractXmlExporter] backupEntities Couldn't backup database data.
 – url: /spaces/doexportspace.action | referer: [https://xxxxxxxxx/spaces/exportspacexml.action?key=SPAPCE] | traceId: 116358ab22940a24 | userName: XXXXXXXX | action: doexportspace
 org.springframework.dao.InvalidDataAccessResourceUsageException: could not extract ResultSet; SQL [n/a]; nested exception is org.hibernate.exception.SQLGrammarException: could not extract ResultSet
 at org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.SessionFactoryUtils.convertHibernateAccessException(SessionFactoryUtils.java:224)
 at org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.HibernateTemplate.doExecute(HibernateTemplate.java:368)
 at org.springframework.orm.hibernate5.HibernateTemplate.execute(HibernateTemplate.java:315)
 ...
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
 Caused by: org.hibernate.exception.SQLGrammarException: could not extract ResultSet
 ....
 Caused by: com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerException: The incoming request has too many parameters. The server supports a maximum of 2100 parameters. Reduce the number of parameters and resend the request.{code}
 
h3. Notes

This is caused by some methods in confluence that returns more than 1000 entities/object. Oracle has a limitation of maximum acceptable number of entities in a list to be 1000

On the MSSQL there is a hard-coded limit (2100) for the number of entries in the IN statement:

https://github.com/Microsoft/msphpsql/blob/v4.2.0-preview/source/shared/core_sqlsrv.h#L172

https://github.com/microsoft/msphpsql/issues/410

h3. Workaround

Exporting the whole space to XML works alright. As such, by copying the pages to a new (empty) Space, and exporting the entire new Space, the pages should be exported successfully.
fields.summary: Space export fails with error: "Couldn't backup database data"
